questions.question: What is the purpose of DISTINCT in SQL?
Which keyword is used to fetch unique values from a column?
What does SELECT DISTINCT column_name do?
options: Selects only unique values in column_name
questions.answer: Selects only unique values in column_name

questions.question: DISTINCT can be used with how many columns?
Which clause is used with SELECT to eliminate duplicates?
What will SELECT DISTINCT city FROM customers do?
DISTINCT affects which part of the result set?
Is SELECT DISTINCT same as GROUP BY?
Can DISTINCT be used with aggregate functions like COUNT()?
What does SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(column_name) return?
Write a query to find all unique job titles from the employees table.
options: SELECT job_title FROM employees GROUP BY job_title;
SELECT job_title FROM employees WHERE UNIQUE;

questions.question: Fetch all unique departments from the departments table.
options: SELECT department GROUP BY department FROM departments;

questions.question: Query to display all unique email domains from a users table.
options: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING_INDEX(email, '@', -1) AS domain FROM users;
SELECT email FROM users GROUP BY domain;
questions.answer: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING_INDEX(email, '@', -1) AS domain FROM users;

questions.question: Find all unique salary values from the salary table.
options: SELECT salary FROM salary GROUP BY salary;

questions.question: List all unique combinations of city and state from the locations table.
options: SELECT DISTINCT city, state FROM locations;
SELECT city, state GROUP BY city, state FROM locations;
SELECT city DISTINCT, state FROM locations;
questions.answer: SELECT DISTINCT city, state FROM locations;

questions.question: Display unique customer names from orders.
Get all unique birth years from users table using a function.
options: SELECT birthdate FROM users GROUP BY YEAR;

questions.question: Retrieve the number of unique cities from address table.
options: SELECT DISTINCT city COUNT() FROM address;

questions.question: Which query lists only unique values of column `category` from table `products`?
Select all unique values of department from employee table.
options: SELECT department GROUP BY department FROM employee;
